context: Hi! I'm great! What kind of movies do you like?
I like movies similar to Dumb and Dumber (1994) and Superbad (2007) I also like Deadpool (2016) and Fargo (1996)
Have you seen Knocked Up (2007) or This Is the End (2013) ?
I have seen both and found them both to be hilarious I have seen those as well and loved them Thanks for your help
resp: The Big Lebowski is also a great movie!
